action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Thanks Jeff.
All updated - I also added Hearing You are based in Sydney and

https://hearingyou.com.au/hearing-aid/phonak/ <https://hearingyou.com.au/hearing-aid/phonak/>

Hearing You stock a range of premium Phonak hearing aids <https://hearingyou.com.au/hearing-aids/>, so they can guarantee affordability and quality. Phonak has been developing, producing and distributing cutting-edge hearing solutions and hearing aids for more than 70 years. Phonak are committed to modern technology and the highest quality of hearing aids, continuously bringing you the best solutions for your individual hearing needs.

Phonak has recently released their most advanced hearing technology yet, the Phonak Paradise hearing aid range. Browse our range of Bluetooth and rechargeable Phonak hearing aids for sale online.

Hearing You are based in Sydney and offer the latest technology and lowest priced Phonak hearing aids <https://hearingyou.com.au/shop/> for sale online. Contact our team by calling 02 9066 0264 <tel:0290660264> or booking an appointment online <https://hearingyou.com.au/book-appointment/>.

https://hearingyou.com.au/hearing-aid/widex/ <https://hearingyou.com.au/hearing-aid/widex/>

Hearing You stock a range of premium Widex hearing aids <https://hearingyou.com.au/hearing-aids/>, so they can guarantee affordability and quality. Widex is renowned as one of the best hearing aid manufacturer's in the world. Since its beginnings in 1956, Widex has been committed to finding solutions to individual hearing loss, letting people connect and communicate easily with their range of hearing aids. With leading edge sound and Bluetooth technology Widex hearing aids can give you the best sound, regardless of where you may find yourself.

Browse our range of Bluetooth and rechargeable Widex hearing aids <https://hearingyou.com.au/shop/> for sale online.
Hearing You are based in Sydney and offer the latest technology and lowest priced Widex hearing aids for sale online. Contact our team by calling 02 9066 0264 <tel:0290660264> or booking an appointment online <https://hearingyou.com.au/book-appointment/>.

https://hearingyou.com.au/hearing-aid/oticon/ <https://hearingyou.com.au/hearing-aid/oticon/>

Hearing You stock a range of premium Oticon hearing aids <https://hearingyou.com.au/hearing-aids/>, so they can guarantee affordability and quality. Oticon is one of the largest hearing aid manufacturer's in the world. Established over 100 years ago, Oticon’s range of hearing devices are manufactured both for adults and children.

Oticon has recently released their most advanced hearing technology yet, the Oticon Opn. The Oticon Opn hearing aid allows users to listen to multiple speakers in noisy environments, opening up a full soundscape.

Browse our range of Bluetooth and rechargeable Oticon hearing aids <https://hearingyou.com.au/shop/> for sale online. Hearing You are based in Sydney and offer the latest technology and lowest priced Oticon hearing aids for sale online. Contact our team by calling 02 9066 0264 <tel:0290660264> or booking an appointment online <https://hearingyou.com.au/book-appointment/>.


https://hearingyou.com.au/hearing-aid/signia/ <https://hearingyou.com.au/hearing-aid/signia/>

Hearing You stock a range of premium Signia hearing aids <http://www.apple.com/>, so they can guarantee affordability and quality. Signia (previously known as Siemens) offers the most advanced sound quality and noise reduction in the latest range of hearing aids. Developed by Werner von Siemens over a quarter of a century, based in Germany Signia now proudly has over 4000 employees around the globe.

Browse our range of Bluetooth and rechargeable Signia hearing aids <https://hearingyou.com.au/shop/> for sale online.
Hearing You are based in Sydney and offer the latest technology and lowest priced Signia hearing aids for sale online. Contact our team by calling 02 9066 0264 <tel:0290660264> or booking an appointment online <https://hearingyou.com.au/book-appointment/>.

https://hearingyou.com.au/hearing-aid/resound/ <https://hearingyou.com.au/hearing-aid/resound/>

Hearing You stock a range of premium Resound hearing aids <https://hearingyou.com.au/hearing-aids/>, so they can guarantee affordability and quality. Resound is a Danish based hearing aid manufacturer with a long standing history of innovative and high quality hearing devices. As one of the first hearing aid manufacturers to introduce Made For iPhone (MFI) hearing aids.

Browse our range of Bluetooth and rechargeable Resound hearing aids <https://hearingyou.com.au/shop/> for sale online. Hearing You are based in Sydney and offer the latest technology and lowest priced Resound hearing aids for sale online. Contact our team by calling 02 9066 0264 <tel:0290660264> or booking an appointment online <https://hearingyou.com.au/book-appointment/>.

Thanks
Brittany


From: Jeff & Lindsay Reinhardt <home@reinhardts.net>
Sent: Thursday, 10 September 2020 9:34 AM
To: Brittany Grimble <brittany@practiceedge.com.au>
Cc: Steven Reinhardt <steven@reinhardts.net>; Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au>
Subject: Re: Product Category Page Content

Thanks Brittany.
Just noticed another very minor tweak, start if third paragraph says “ Hearing you based in Sydney” should read
“ Hearing you are based in Sydney”

Kind regards,

Jeffrey Reinhardt

M +61 414 95 33 11 <tel:+61%20414%2095%2033%2011>
